familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Pres. Trump resigned as president of 4 Shadow Tree Lane LLC, but retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, is not inactive nor dormant, and is not part of an entity structure or license deal.

Pres. Trump resigned as president/director/chairman of 4 Shadow Tree Lane Member Corp., but retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.

conflictDescription: TEST DESCRIPTION FOR THE CONFLICT (Friendly Name): 4 Shadow Tree Lane
